test_conflict_resolutions.conflict_description: Potential conflict between data retention requirements for AI safety monitoring and privacy principles requiring data minimization

resolution_details.conditions: Data retention for safety monitoring is permitted with explicit user consent and time-limited storage

test_conflict_resolutions.conflict_description: Tension between algorithmic fairness requirements and transparency obligations when revealing algorithmic details could enable gaming

resolution_details.conditions: Transparency requirements apply with appropriate safeguards to prevent algorithmic gaming while maintaining fairness

test_conflict_resolutions.conflict_description: Overlap between safety principle requirements and reliability principle validation procedures

resolution_details.conditions: Safety principle encompasses reliability requirements; separate reliability validation is redundant

test_conflict_resolutions.conflict_description: Unclear boundaries between privacy protection requirements and transparency obligations for personal data processing

resolution_details.conditions: Privacy takes precedence for personal data; transparency applies to algorithmic processes and aggregate outcomes

test_conflict_resolutions.conflict_description: Timing conflicts between immediate safety interventions and fairness assessment procedures

resolution_details.conditions: Safety interventions take immediate precedence; fairness assessment follows within 24 hours

test_conflict_resolutions.conflict_description: Resource allocation conflicts when implementing fairness, transparency, and reliability requirements simultaneously

resolution_details.conditions: Implement shared infrastructure for fairness and transparency monitoring; reliability checks integrated into existing processes
